net.consensys.cava.rlpx

Class RLPxConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.consensys.cava.rlpx.RLPxConnection

  • public final class RLPxConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    Connection between 2 peers over the RLPx protocol.

    The RLPx protocol creates a exchange of unique secrets during an initial handshake. The peers proceed to communicate using the shared secrets.

    This connection allows encrypting and decrypting messages with a remote peer.

    • Method Detail

      • isComplementedBy

        public static boolean isComplementedBy(RLPxConnection one,
                                       RLPxConnection other)
        Checks if two RLPx connections represent both ends of a connection.

        Used for testing.

        Parameters:
        one - one RLPx connection
        other - an other RLPx connection
        Returns:
        true if both connections refer to the same peers, on each side of the connection
